They take shelter from the downpour.
Thunder only unnerves them a little...

A lightning bolt reduces a tree to ruin!
The two cower away from the blast.

The lightning defeats a foe! What luck!
Their reward for good deeds done?

Everyone made it through unharmed!
Even the bunny they heroically saved!

A massive cake baked to celebrate the
seventh anniversary. It's an event item.

Used in Aether Raids to build structures that
are available for a limited time. If that period
has elapsed, these stones will be lost.

Heroes cannot engage with multiple
Emblem Heroes. Hero cannot engage.

$aOnce engaged, target Hero will gain
enhancements to their Special from
the Emblem Hero as well as stat
increases based on the Emblem
Hero's merge count.

Want to engage $a0
and $a1?

Emblem Heroes can engage with one
Hero at a time, maximum. The Hero
being engaged with can be changed
at any time.

Engage:
Emblem Heroes can engage with
other Heroes. By engaging with
another Hero, an Emblem Hero
is able to grant that other Hero
special powers.

Engage Effect - Enhance Special:
Engaged Hero's Special enhanced.
(Enhancement varies for each
Emblem Hero.)

Engage Effect - Enhance Stats:
Grants engaged unit stat increases
based on the Emblem Hero's
merge count. Every merge grants
the effect of a Dragonflower.
These increases do not impact
how stats influence opponent
selection in modes like Arena.

More Information:
Emblem Heroes cannot engage
with duplicates of themselves.
